MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA14 postcode area of Port Glasgow, affecting properties in John Wood Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:17pm. Our emergency response team have arrived in the local area to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:00pm on Friday, 18th of December 2020
